# **Ortschaftenverzeichnis Kanton Thurgau 2022**

[Link to dataset on data.tg.ch](https://data.tg.ch/explore/dataset/sk-stat-111/information/)

## Description

<p>Das Ortschaftenverzeichnis enthält die Ortschaften des Kantons Thurgau und ihre Zuordnung zu den Politischen Gemeinden. Zudem finden sich Angaben zur Wohnbevölkerung (Wohnbevölkerung nach Geschlecht, Alter, Nationalität und Konfession, Stand 31.12.2021). <br/></p>

## Load Packages

Every dataset (csv and geodata) on [data.tg.ch](https://data.tg.ch/pages/start/) can be retrieved with the **tgAPI** package. You can download it via [GitHub](https://github.com/ogdtg/tgAPI). Please note that the package has some dependencies, which can result in a lengthy installation process. Therefore, we do not recommend installing the package directly in Google Colab. However, if you intend to run this code on your local machine, we strongly recommend installing the tgAPI package.

```{r}
library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
library(dplyr)
# library(remotes)
# remotes::install.github("ogdtg/tgAPI")

```


## Download Data


```{r}
# Download the Dataset via API
res <- httr::GET("https://data.tg.ch/api/explore/v2.0/catalog/datasets/sk-stat-111/exports/json")
data <- res$content %>%
  rawToChar() %>%
  jsonlite::fromJSON()

# Use tgAPI
# data <- tgAPI::get_dataset("sk-stat-111")

head(data)

```


## Explore Metadata
